summary: The Farm and Food Cybersecurity Act of 2025 directs the Secretary of Agriculture to assess cybersecurity threats and vulnerabilities in the agriculture and food critical infrastructure sector every two years. It mandates an annual cross-sector simulation exercise relating to food-related emergencies or disruptions, involving multiple federal agencies and private sector stakeholders. The bill aims to enhance security, resilience, and coordination within the food supply chain, and includes authorization of appropriations for the simulation exercises.
